column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The hot-blooded storekeeper and her trusty alpaca gaze at you inquisitively.
Search for the malodorous coffee bean thief.
Speak with the malodorous coffee bean thief.
Retrieve the sack of stolen coffee beans.
Deliver the sack of stolen coffee beans to the hot-blooded storekeeper.
Hmm... Interesting. My darling Alpy didn't spit at your approach.
Which can only mean she trusts you! And if she does, then so do I! As such... I would ask a favor. Recently, a sack of premium coffee beans was stolen from our storehouse.

The thieves came in the dead of night, but I was wide awake to catch them in the act─a band of Hoobigo mercenaries. My brave Alpy spat on their leader square in the face, and thanks to her saliva's distinctive scent, I was able to track them down.

They were well-armed, however, so I resolved to give up on the coffee beans. But for a strapping <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>fellow</If> like you, contending with those thieves shouldn't be a problem! So please, I beg you─go to Oruncanca, and teach them a lesson!
You'll find the coffee bean thieves in Oruncanca. Please go there and teach them a lesson!
<retch> Urgh... The smell! I can't get rid of the smell!
What!? Who are yo─ <heave> Gah! I've had it up to here today! Boys, get <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If>!
Smells worse than shit!
I'm gonna kill you, then that alpaca!
B-Boys...? Damn you! You'll regret this!
You're returned! And you look none the worse for wear. What a relief.
Ah, our precious coffee beans! Thank you so, so much! I knew I could trust you.
Coffee's popularity continues to soar, as does the demand for it. I'm afraid incidents like this one have grown increasingly more common.
Everyone's been pouring their hearts into this, to make the most delicious coffee possible and give the mate tea farms a run for their money.

And yet those thieves tried to steal the very fruit of our labors! Bad apples, the lot of them! And you know a bad apple when you see one, don't you, Alpy? They <Emphasis>deserve</Emphasis> to be spat on! <ptooey>
Oh, sorry about that! I got a little carried away. But I've taken up enough of your time. Here─a little something for your troubles. And the spittle...
